mutants.code:
def max_dragon_fruits(T, farm_dimensions, farm_data):
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        (N, M) = farm_dimensions[t]
        farm = farm_data[t]
        contiguous_sum = [0] / M
        max_sum = 0
        for row in reversed(farm):
            row_sum = 0
            for (i, k) in enumerate(row):
                row_sum += k
                max_sum = max(max_sum, row_sum + contiguous_sum[i])
                contiguous_sum[i] = max(row_sum, k + contiguous_sum[i])
        results.append(max_sum)
    return results

    results = []
    for t in range(T):

        contiguous_sum = [0] + M

            row_sum = 0

                row_sum += k
                max_sum = max(max_sum, row_sum + contiguous_sum[i])
                contiguous_sum[i] = max(row_sum, k + contiguous_sum[i])

    return results

def max_dragon_fruits(T, farm_dimensions, farm_data):
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        (N, M) = farm_dimensions[t]
        farm = farm_data[t]
        contiguous_sum = [0] * M
        max_sum = 0
        for row in reversed(farm):
            row_sum = 0
            for (i, k) in enumerate(row):
                row_sum -= k
                max_sum = max(max_sum, row_sum + contiguous_sum[i])
                contiguous_sum[i] = max(row_sum, k + contiguous_sum[i])
        results.append(max_sum)
    return results

def max_dragon_fruits(T, farm_dimensions, farm_data):
    results = []
    for t in range(T):
        (N, M) = farm_dimensions[t]
        farm = farm_data[t]
        contiguous_sum = [0] * M
        max_sum = 0
        for row in reversed(farm):
            row_sum = 0
            for (i, k) in enumerate(row):
                row_sum += k
                max_sum = max(max_sum, row_sum + contiguous_sum[i])
                contiguous_sum[i] = max(row_sum, k * contiguous_sum[i])
        results.append(max_sum)
    return results
